Sample Request Url#]
/rest/asset/v1/folders.json?root={"id":14,"type":"Folder"}

parameters.name: root
parameters.description:
Root folder in the database.
A JSON block of the following form:
    {
        "id" : 1234,
        "type" : "Folder"
    }
where "id" is the folder id (integer), and "type" is either "Program" or "Folder" (string).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Record number where result set should begin.  Default value is 0.

parameters.name: maxDepth
parameters.description: Maximum number of levels to inspect in directory hierarchy.  Default value is 2.

parameters.name: maxReturn
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return.  Default value is 20.  Maximum value is 200.

parameters.name: workSpace
parameters.description: Workspace filter.

post.description: This API allows the caller to update a folder using the Id of the folder.

externalDocs.description:
Request Sample
type=Folder&description=This is a test (update 01)
Response Sample
{ "success": true, "warnings": [], "errors": [], "requestId": "c5b2#14e1f3954bf", "result": [ { "name": "Learning - deverly", "description": "This is a test (update 01)", "createdAt": "2015-03-17T00:17:02Z+0000", "updatedAt": "2015-06-23T07:02:07Z+0000", "url": "https://app-abm.marketo.com/#MF1044A1", "folderId": { "id": 407, "type": "FOLDER" }, "folderType": "Marketing Folder", "parent": { "id": 15, "type": "FOLDER" }, "path": "/Marketing Activities/Default/Learning - deverly", "isArchive": false, "isSystem": false, "accessZoneId": 1, "workspace": "Default", "id": 407 } ] }
Sample Request Url#]
/rest/asset/v1/folder/407.json

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of folder to update.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of folder to update.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Update folder with this description.  Maximum length 2000 characters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Update folder with this name. Maximum length 255 characters.  Must be unique to the workspace.  Name cannot be updated for programs.

parameters.name: isArchive
parameters.description: Set to true to archive the folder. If true, then all child folders will be archive as well.

get.description: This API allows the caller to get the folder or program by name.

externalDocs.description:
Request Sample
Response Sample
{ "success": true, "warnings": [], "errors": [], "requestId": "19#14e1f2f3688", "result": [ { "name": "Test 10 - deverly", "description": "This is a test", "createdAt": "2015-06-23T06:27:04Z+0000", "updatedAt": "2015-06-23T06:27:04Z+0000", "url": "https://app-abm.marketo.com/#MF1070A1", "folderId": { "id": 454, "type": "FOLDER" }, "folderType": "Marketing Folder", "parent": { "id": 416, "type": "FOLDER" }, "path": "/Marketing Activities/Default/Marketing Programs - deverly/Test 10 - deverly", "isArchive": false, "isSystem": false, "accessZoneId": 1, "workspace": "Default", "id": 454 } ] }
Sample Request Url#]
/rest/asset/v1/folder/byName.json?name=Test%2010%20-%20deverly

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of folder in the database.  Case insensitive.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of folder to retrieve.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program
If not specified, then all folder types are retrieved.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: Id of the parent folder in the database.

parameters.name: workSpace
parameters.description: Workspace that folder belongs to.

get.description: This API allows the caller to get the contents of a folder.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the folder to retrieve.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of folder to retrieve.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Where to begin when retrieving entries.  Can be use used in conjunction with maxReturn parameter to page through large result sets.  Default: 0

parameters.name: maxReturn
parameters.description: Max number of entities to be returned.  Default: 20.  Maximum: 200.

post.description: This API allows the caller to delete a folder by folder id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of folder to be deleted.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of folder to delete.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program

get.description: This API allows the caller to get tokens for a folder based on the folder id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
Id of folder or program.
The id can be obtained by calling either Get Folder By Name or Browse Folders.  The id is returned in the "folderId" attribute in the response.  Example: "folderId": { "id" : 15, type" : "Folder"},

parameters.name: folderType
parameters.description:
Type of container that token is associated with.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program

post.description: This API allows the caller to delete a token by folder id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of folder or program associated with tokens.

parameters.name: folderType
parameters.description:
Type of container that token is associated with.
Permissible values:
Folder
Program

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of token.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Data type for token.  
List of permissibile values:
date
iCalendar
number
rich text
score
script block
sfdc campaign
text

parameters.name: offset
maxReturn
parameters.description: Max number of email templates to returned. Default 20, Maximum 200.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Status of the template.
Permissible values:
Approved
Draft

post.description: This API allows you to update an email using its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of email

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Updated description of the email

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Updated name for the email

post.description: This API allows you to delete an email by the id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of email

post.description: This API allows you to update an email's content by id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Email id.

parameters.name: subject*
parameters.description: Subject for email.

parameters.name: fromEmail*
parameters.description: From email address for email.

parameters.name: fromName*
parameters.description: From name for email.

parameters.name: replyTO*
parameters.description: Reply email address for email.

post.summary: Update Email Content In Editable Section

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Email id.

parameters.name: htmlId
parameters.description: HTML id of the editable section.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of editable section.  Permissible values are: Text, DynamicContent, Snippet.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description:
Depends on the "type" of editable section that is specified.
Text - Contains the HTML content.
DynamicContent - id of the Segmentation to segment the dyanmic content.
Snippet - The id of snippet.  To find the snippet id, go to Design Studio and click on the snippet.  The id is the numeric value following the #SN in the URL.  e.g. For this URL: https://app-abm.marketo.com/#SN1013B2ZN395 the id is "1013".

parameters.name: textValue
parameters.description: Text content if type is Text.

post.summary: Update Email Dynamic Content by Id
post.description: This API allows you to create or update a section of dynamic content by segment id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Email id.

parameters.name: dynamicContentId
parameters.description:
This id is generated by the system.  
You can obtain the id using one of the following methods:
1. Get Email Content by Id to get editable section.
2. Get Email by Id to get email headers.

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: Segment name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Content for segment.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of content.  Permissible values: HTML, Text.

post.description: This API allows you to send sample email to a given address.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Email id.

parameters.name: emailAddress
parameters.description: Email  address to receive sample email.

parameters.name: textOnly
parameters.description: Sends the text version of the sample email in addition to the HTML version.  Permissible values are: true, false.  Default is false.

parameters.name: leadId
parameters.description: The lead id.  If lead id is specified, then the token values for the lead are populated when the email is sent.

parameters.name: mergeInCRM
parameters.description:
Set to true to merge in CRM.  
Use only one winning lead id and one losing lead id when enabling this parameter.
If both leads are in SFDC and one is a CRM lead and the other is a CRM contact, then the winner is the CRM contact (regardless which lead is specified as winner).  Note that the leads are merged within SFDC.
If one of the leads is in SFDC and the other is Marketo only, then the winner is the SFDC lead (regardless of which lead is specified as winner).
